name: Free Online Video Compressor - ATools
description: Free online video compressor to MP4 (H.264) with scaling and CRF quality control. Runs locally.
seoDescription: Free online video compressor that exports MP4 (H.264) with optional 720p/1080p scaling, CRF quality control, encoder preset, and audio bitrate. Powered by ffmpeg.wasm and runs locally in your browser with zero uploads for privacy.

ui.hint: Video compressor to MP4 (H.264) with CRF quality control and optional scaling. Loads ffmpeg.wasm locally (no uploads).
ui.errPickVideo: Please select a video file first.
ui.errCompressFailed: Compression failed (codec may be unavailable or resources are insufficient).
ui.note: Note: higher CRF means smaller size and lower quality (common range: 20–28).
